articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Mushroom Farm in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Mushroom Farm in Pyongyang
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), gave field guidance to the newly-built Pyongyang City Mushroom Farm.
					 Enjoying a bird's-eye view of the farm, he said that it was built in a neat and elegant way and its buildings and environment were clean.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the construction of such excellent mushroom farm, saying that Pyongyang City took the lead in implementing the Party's policy of building modern mushroom farms in all provinces, cities and counties.
					
					 After being briefed on the farm before its panoramic map, he went round various parts of the farm to learn in detail about its construction and production.
					
					 The Pyongyang City Mushroom Farm has a large production capacity and it is perfect in the integrated system of production processes ranging from raw material feeding to forwarding and the management information system, he noted.
					
					 Saying that the farm was built well as intended by the Party, he stressed the need to properly carry on its production and management so that the citizens in Pyongyang could benefit from it in practice.
					
					 And he urged all provinces, cities and counties to build such modern mushroom production bases as the Pyongyang City Mushroom Farm and meticulously organize the work to secure species of mushroom and substratum suitable to their local features and introduce advanced science and technology.
					
					 He said that he was very pleasant to see the newly-built mushroom farm, a rare edifice provided for the people, at the beginning of the new year and that it would be very glad to see every day of a year go like that happy day. And he noted with pleasure that Pyongyang City made the first achievement for significant 2015. 
					
					 He gave thanks on behalf of the WPK Central Committee to the builders, scientists and technicians of Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Pyongyang University of Architecture and Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering and officials and workers of relevant units who made contribution to the construction of the farm, asking to convey his regards to them.
					
					 He had a photo session with the officials and employees of the farm.
					
					 Then he ardently called for bringing about a radical change in the improvement of the people's living standard this significant year.
					
					 Accompanying him were KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the KPA General Political Bureau, Han Kwang Sang, department director of the WPK Central Committee, Ri Jae Il, first vice department director of the C.C., WPK, and Kim Yo Jong, vice department director of the C.C., WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Kim Sun Im
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Kim Sun Im
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un Saturday sent a wreath to the bier of Kim Sun Im, widow of indomitable pro-reunification patriotic fighter Ri In Mo, expressing deep condolences over her death.

articles.title: KCNA Report
articles.content:
KCNA Report
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency released the following report on Saturday:
					 Recently the DPRK government proposed a crucial step to the U.S. government to remove the danger of war, ease tension and create a peaceful climate on the Korean peninsula, prompted by the desire to join efforts of all Koreans to open up a broad avenue to independent reunification in 2015 marking the 70th anniversary of the division of the Korean nation.
					
					 The large-scale war games ceaselessly held every year in south Korea are the root cause of the escalating tension on the peninsula and the danger of nuclear war facing our nation. It is needless to say that there can be neither trust-based dialogue nor detente and stability on the peninsula in such a gruesome atmosphere in which war drills are staged against the dialogue partner.
					
					 The United States should desist from pursuing the anachronistic policy hostile towards the DPRK and reckless acts of aggression and boldly make a policy switch.
					
					 If this significant year can be made a year free from joint military exercises on the peninsula, it will greatly contribute to providing reconciliation and trust for Korea's reunification and, furthermore, for peace and security in Northeast Asia.
					
					 The message containing the proposal of the DPRK government was handed to the U.S. side through a relevant channel on Jan. 9.
					
					 The message proposed the U.S. to contribute to easing tension on the Korean peninsula by temporarily suspending joint military exercises in south Korea and its vicinity this year, and said that in this case the DPRK is ready to take such responsive step as temporarily suspending the nuclear test over which the U.S. is concerned.
					
					 And it expressed the DPRK's stand that if the U.S. needs dialogue as regards this issue, the former is ready to sit with the U.S. anytime.
					
					 If the joint military exercises staged by the U.S. in south Korea and its vicinity every year are targeted on the DPRK only, there will be no reason why the former cannot accept the DPRK's proposal.
					
					 Now is the time for the U.S. to make a bold decision for peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia.

articles.title: Korean Women Help Various Fields of National Economy
articles.content:
Korean Women Help Various Fields of National Economy
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Officials and members of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea helped workers and farmers.
					 The art squad of the Central Committee of the women's union and members of its itinerant art squads across the country went to the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill, the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex, the Hamnam Area Coal Mining Complex and other units and encouraged the workers there by conducting agitation activities for increased production and broadcasting.
					
					 Organizations of the women's union are sincerely helping the countryside.
					
					 For the first three days of the new year they sent lots of farming materials including hundreds of thousands tons of composts to the farms which are associated with the leadership exploits of the peerless great persons.
					
					 Officials of the women's union in Jagang, South Phyongan and South Hwanghae provinces, Kim Chaek City and Kangso District took the lead in aiding farmers.
					
					 Decades of women in the township of Sonchon County, North Phyongan Province volunteered to work at the industrial factory in the county.
					
					 Members of the women's union of Sariwon and Wonsan cities and Hochon and Kujang counties dynamically conducted frontline-style agitation activities at coal mines and power stations and handed lots of working tools and other materials over to the workers there.

articles.title: Masikryong Ski Resort Draws Many Visitors
articles.content:
Masikryong Ski Resort Draws Many Visitors
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The Masikryong Ski Resort is visited by many people from all walks of life, school youth and children and foreigners.
					 After arriving at Masikryong Hotel, they go round various places at the resort, recollecting with deep emotion the leadership feats performed by Marshal Kim Jong Un to build the resort as a great edifice.
					
					 They express great admiration for ski courses and eye-catching structures and service facilities matching well their surrounding mountainous environment.
					
					  Visitors enjoy a bird's-eye view of mountain scenery from Taehwa Peak more than 1 360m above the sea level and skiing after going up there by cable, riding snow motorcycles.
					
					 They are leading diverse cultural and emotional life at the swimming pool and entertainment halls of the fashionable hotel.
					
					 Foreign guests also spend pleasant time at the resort.

articles.title: Tree-planting Campaign Scheduled in DPRK
articles.content:
Tree-planting Campaign Scheduled in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Preparations for tree-planting campaign through a mass movement have been sped up in the DPRK to restore the mountains of the country in a way that all the people carried out its rehabilitation after the Korean War (1950-1953).
					 As part of the preparations, different methods of planting trees in summer have been completed to be applied on a large scale.
					
					 In this regard, Son Kwang Chol, manager of the Central Tree Nursery under the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection, told KCNA:
					
					 True to the behests of leader Kim Jong Il on planting trees in all seasons, the nursery has tapped several methods of planting trees in summer.
					
					 Those methods will reduce the cost of cultivating saplings, while foresting mountains in a relatively short span of time.
					
					 The nursery will make every effort to invent new tree-planting methods and increase species of saplings so as to contribute to turning the whole country into a thick woodland and greenery, in hearty response to the Party's call for turning out in the campaign to restore the mountains of the country.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korea Not to Seek "Unification of Systems"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korea Not to Seek "Unification of Systems"
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The north and the south should refrain from seeking confrontation of systems and "unification of systems" while absolutizing their own ideologies and systems in order to satisfactorily resolve the reunification issue in conformity with the common interests of the nation, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article. 
					 The article goes on:
					
					 Seeking confrontation of systems and "unification of systems" is the revelation of deep-rooted hostility and evil repugnancy toward the ideology and system of the north and sinister intention to stifle the north. It is the hotbed of the evil cycle of distrust and conflict between the north and the south and it may ignite a war in the end. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities have long sought confrontation of systems and "unification of systems". They are aimed at bringing down the system of the north after labeling its fellow countrymen "enemy".
					
					 The danger of the moves for confrontation of systems and "unification of systems" lies in that it opens up the way for outside forces to perpetrate interference and aggression and it is the deplorable traitorous act of selling out the interests of the nation. 
					
					 If the north and the south share one purpose and join efforts, they are able to achieve reunification by federal formula, not "unification of systems". 
					
					 The DPRK resolutely rejects all the attempts to justify "unification of systems" while introducing "experience" of other country. 
					
					 The north and the south have a great programme for reunification common to the nation as it is most suitable to the actual conditions of Korea and fully confirms with the demand of the whole nation. 
					
					 The DPRK will readily join hands with the south Korean authorities for independent and peaceful reunification of the country if they drop their conception of confrontation of systems and truly respect the ideology and system of the north and choose the way of co-existence and co-prosperity.

articles.title: S. Korea Accused of Chilling Atmosphere of Mending North-South Relations
articles.content:
S. Korea Accused of Chilling Atmosphere of Mending North-South Relations
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the joint chiefs of staff of the south Korean puppet army recently cried out for "having capacity and tightening posture to resolutely punish" someone in case of his "provocation" while flying aboard a fighter jet in the sky above hotspot southwestern waters of the West Sea of Korea.
					 Units of various levels of the puppet army including the 3rd and 6th corps and the 11th mechanized infantry division have simultaneously launched on January 2 such drills as ones for firing demonstration, survival and overcoming difficulties in biting cold, field mobile operations and artillery firing. Against this backdrop, brass hats of the south Korean military noisily trumpeted about what they called "certain victory" and "perfect combat posture."
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 Needless to say, such saber-rattling is chilling the atmosphere of repairing the north-south relations amid the great expectations of all Koreans and again escalating confrontation and tension.
					
					 Whenever there was a sign of improvement of the north-south relations, the south Korean authorities deliberately hurled war maniacs into saber-rattling. This racket is a deliberate provocation of confrontation maniacs opposed to the improvement of the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are now becoming vocal urging the north to show "sincerity" and take a "practical action" as regards north-south dialogue.
					
					 As seen above, they are busy staging mad-cap war drills targeting their dialogue partner, screwing up tension from the outset of the year.
					
					 They are sadly mistaken if they think such double-dealing attitude as calling for dialogue while staging such saber-rattling can work.
					
					 If the inter-Korean relations are again thrown into the evil cycle of confrontation due to such reckless drills, the south Korean authorities will be held wholly accountable for it.

articles.title: Korean in US Calls for Reunifying Country in Idea of By Our Nation Itself
articles.content:
Korean in US Calls for Reunifying Country in Idea of By Our Nation Itself
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Hyon Hwan, director of the Institute of Independent Ideology in the U.S., made public an article on Jan. 4 in support of the New Year address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					 Kim Jong Un in his New Year address referred to the idea of By Our Nation Itself, saying nothing is impossible if the Korean nation shares one purpose and joins efforts, the article said, and went on:
					
					 There is no reason why the north and the south should live separated while remaining hostile with each other because of their differing ideologies and systems.
					
					 One should not force its ideology and system upon the other but solve the reunification issue in conformity with the common interests of the nation.
					
					 For doing so, it is necessary to boost north-south exchange and cooperation.
					
					 Division has persisted on the Korean peninsula for 7 decades due to the U.S. policy of aggression and its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. staged large-scale war drills every year together with the south Korean authorities, escalating tension on the Korean peninsula and bringing the danger of a nuclear war to the Korean nation.
					
					 It should desist from pursing the anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK and resorting to reckless war moves but make a bold policy switchover. The south Korean authorities should discontinue nuclear war drills in league with foreign forces.
					
					 All Koreans should achieve the great national unity in the idea of By Our Nation Itself so as to reunify the country independently and peacefully, the article said, calling upon all Koreans to join efforts to open up a broad avenue to independent reunification this year, the 70th anniversary of national liberation.

articles.title: Russian Khabarovsk Territorial Society for Study of Juche Idea Formed
articles.content:
Russian Khabarovsk Territorial Society for Study of Juche Idea Formed
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The Russian Khabarovsk Territorial Society for the Study of the Juche Idea and Experience in Socialist Construction of the DPRK was formed on Dec. 29 last year.
					 The secretary for information service of the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation was elected chairman of the society.

articles.title: Juche Idea Serves as Great Guiding Idea in Era of Independence: Russian Personage
articles.content:
Juche Idea Serves as Great Guiding Idea in Era of Independence: Russian Personage
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The Juche idea has been kept as the great guiding idea in the era of independence in the minds of the world's progressive peoples.
					 The secretary for information service of the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation who doubles as chairman of the Russian Khabarovsk Territorial Society for the Study of the Juche Idea and Experience in Socialist Construction of the DPRK, said this at an inaugural ceremony of the society on Dec. 29.
					
					 He noted:
					
					 The praiseworthy reality of the DPRK is fully demonstrating the validity and vitality of the Juche idea and arousing the admiration of the international community.
					
					 The Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung was developed in depth by leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, the Korean people are scoring signal successes in the building of a thriving socialist nation under the unfurled banner of the Juche idea.
					
					 The Juche idea is encouraging the people in their struggle for the cause of global independence.

articles.title: Annual General Meeting of Committee for the Study of Juche Idea of DR Congo Held
articles.content:
Annual General Meeting of Committee for the Study of Juche Idea of DR Congo Held
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- An annual general meeting of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo was held in Kinshasa on Jan. 3.
					 It was attended by Chairman Andre Lohekele Kalonda, Secretary General Jean Mbongopassi and other members of the committee, and personages of the Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of DR Congo, the Association for Implementing the Juche Philosophy of DR Congo, the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of the University of Kinshasa, and the Youth Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in DR Congo.
					
					 The meeting reviewed the successes and experience in the work to study and disseminate the Juche idea last year.
					
					 It also discussed the working plan to increase the ranks of adherents of the Juche idea and more actively study and disseminate the idea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Studied in Switzerland, Bangladesh
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Studied in Switzerland, Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- A seminar and reading session on supreme leader Kim Jong Un's New Year address were held by the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy on Jan. 2 and 3.
					 The reporter and other speakers including Martin Lotscher, chief of the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, gave a detailed account of the fact that Kim Jong Un reviewed the brilliant victory and achievements in building a thriving nation last year and advanced militant tasks for the new year in the address. 
					
					 They expressed the firm belief that the army and people of the DPRK would carry out the tasks to the letter and glorify this year as a year of great triumph, a year of revolutionary auspicious events.
					
					 They renewed their resolutions to give much publicity to the brilliant reality of the DPRK dynamically advancing under the leadership of Kim Jong Un and intensify the movement for solidarity with the just struggle of the Korean people for the national prosperity and reunification.
					
					 At the reading session M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, quoted Kim Jong Un as saying that the north and the south, as they had already agreed, should resolve the national reunification issue in the common interests of the nation transcending the differences in ideology and system.
					
					 The chairman noted Kim Jong Un appealed to all Koreans to strive hard to glorify this significant year as a year of great victories and revolutionary auspicious events, rallied closer behind the Party and singing aloud the march of final victory.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Praised as Brilliant Commander by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Praised as Brilliant Commander by Nigerian Organization
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website an article praising the feats performed by supreme leader Kim Jong Un as the Songun brilliant commander on Dec. 30 last year on the third anniversary of his assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The article said the world witnessed the outstanding supreme commander who beefed up the military muscle of the country to protect not only its security and people but the regional peace and stability. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un inspected the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the KPA on Jan. 1, 2012 and since then continued his inspection of units of the KPA, the article noted, and went on:
					
					 He demonstrated the matchless grit and will as an iron-willed commander by frustrating the U.S. and its followers' reckless nuclear war moves. 
					
					 The article introduced his Songun leadership exploits featured by affection and devotion, saying that for the past three years the world saw the extraordinary supreme commander who showed warm loving care for the soldiers and turned the whole army into units of comrades-in-arm based on comradeship.
					
					 The article recalled facts that over the last three years the world saw the peerless supreme commander bringing about eye-opening wonders and innovations not only in the national defence but in the economic construction with the army playing a main role.
					
					 The world will continue to see Kim Jong Un registering shining successes in the defence of socialism and the building of a thriving nation on the strength of tremendous military muscle, the article concluded.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported Abroad
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain made public a statement on Jan. 2 in support of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's New Year address.
					 The statement hailed the address and fully supported it.
					
					 His address is a great programme of Juche that puts down all evil ideas running counter to the intention of the Korean people and progressive humankind and demonstrates the invincible spirit of the DPRK to emerge victorious, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Un, who is identical to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, resolutely foiled the challenges and disturbances by the hostile forces in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, firmly protected socialism and achieved the single-minded unity of the whole society with his warm affection for the people.
					
					 He clearly indicated in his New Year address the ways for mending the north-south relations and achieving Korea's reunification.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should stop acting as a puppet of the U.S.
					
					 They should unconditionally accept his proposal for national reunification. 
					
					 We will breathe the same breath as the Korean people, devotedly protect the authority of Kim Jong Un, the heart of the Juche revolution, and give wide publicity to his idea and exploits all over the world.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Fabrica de Hongos de Ciudad de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Fabrica de Hongos de Ciudad de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 10 de enero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recorrio la Fabrica de Hongos de la ciudad de Pyongyang nuevamente construida.
					Contemplando el panorama de la fabrica, el Mariscal se puso alegre de que la fabrica se haya construido vistosamente y los edificios y sus contornos se hayan mantenido limpios.
					
					El partido llamo a construir en las provincias, ciudades y distritos las modernas fabricas de hongos y la ciudad de Pyongyang levanto primero la bandera de su materializacion, dijo  con gran satisfecho de que fue levantada excelentemente la fabrica.
					
					Tras escuchar explicaciones ante el plano de la fabrica, el Mariscal recorrio las salas de control, inoculacion, formacion, cultivo, preparacion tecnica, divulgacion de conocimientos cientificos y tecnicos y modelado de materiales, el lugar de cultivo al aire libre y otros puntos para conocer en detalles de la construccion y produccion.
					
					Dijo que es una fabrica capaz de producir anualmente gran cantidad de hongos.
					
					Senalo que estan totalmente perfeccionado el sistema combinado de los procesos de produccion desde el metimiento de materias  primas hasta el envio y el sistema de informacion de la administracion empresarial.
					
					Al referir que la fabrica fue construida conforme a la voluntad del partido, enfatizo que al esmerar la produccion y las actividades administrativas, los ciudadanos deben ser beneficiados de la fabrica.
					
					Instruyo que todas las provincias, ciudades y distritos deben construir excelentemente la base de construccion de hongos tan moderna como la de la ciudad de Pyongyang, y enfatizo la necesidad de solucionar los problemas de variedad de hongos y materiales conforme a las caracteristicas de  sus propias localidades y de introducir la ciencia y tecnologia avanzadas.
					
					Dijo que recorrio con satisfaccion la fabrica, levantada como una creacion vistoso para el pueblo y agrego que la ciudad de Pyongyang preparo el primer exito en el ano significativo 2015.
					
					Tras encomendar enviar su saludo a los constructores, los cientificos y los tecnicos de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek, la Universidad de Arquitectura de Pyongyang y la Universidad de Maquinaria de Pyongyang y los funcionarios y los obreros de las unidades interesadas, quienes hicieron activo aporte a la construccion de la moderna base de produccion de hongos, dio a ellos el agradecimiento en nombre del CC del PTC.
					
					Luego, el Mariscal tomo una foto de recuerdo junto con los funcionarios y los empleados de la fabrica.
					
					El Mariscal exhorto fervientemente a traer en el presente ano significativo el cambio en la mejora de vida del pueblo.
					
					Le acompanaron el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Han Kwang Sang, el primer subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Ri Jae Il y la subjefa de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Yo Jong.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunta Kim Sun Im
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunta Kim Sun Im
Pyongyang, 10 de enero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio el dia 10 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro de la difunta Kim Sun Im, viuda del indoblegable combatiente patriotico pro-reunificacion Ri In Mo, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: Publicada informacion de ACNC
articles.content:
Publicada informacion de ACNC
Pyongyang, 10 de enero (ACNC) -- La Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea hizo publica el dia 10 la siguiente informacion:
					Ultimamente, el gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea propuso al gobierno estadounidense las medidas importantes para eliminar el peligro de guerra, aliviar la tension y crear el ambiente pacifico en la Peninsula Coreana, partiendo del deseo de abrir con las fuerzas unidas de la nacion coreana el ancho camino para la reunificacion independiente en el ano nuevo 2015 en que se acogeran 70 anos de division de la nacion coreana. 
					
					Los ejercicios belicos de gran envergadura que se desarrollan incesantemente cada ano en el Sur de Corea son la causa principal que agrava la tension en la Peninsula y trae el peligro de la guerra nuclear sobre la nacion coreana. 
					
					No hay duda alguna de que es imposible realizar los dialogos fiables y hablar del alivio de la tension y la estabilidad en la Peninsula Coreana, mientras continuen los ejercicios de guerra de una parte contra la otra creando un ambiente de horror.
					
					EE.UU. debe cambiar con audacia su politica sin recurrir a la anacronica politica hostil a la RPDC y a la imprudente guerra de agresion. 
					
					Si se puede hacer del presente un ano sin ejercicios militares conjuntos en la Peninsula Coreana, esto sera un gran aporte a lograr la reunificacion de Corea y a la larga, preparar la reconciliacion y confianza para la paz y seguridad del Nordeste Asiatico.
					
					El mensaje que contiene tal propuesta del gobierno de la RPDC fue entregado el pasado dia 9 a la parte estadounidense por via correspondiente. 
					
					El mensaje propone a EE.UU. contribuir al alivio de tension en la Peninsula Coreana con el cese temporal de los ejercicios belicos militares en el Sur de Corea y su contorno y aclara la voluntad de responderle con la suspension temporal de la prueba nuclear de que se preocupa EE.UU. 
					
					Tambien expone la posicion de que estamos listos para hacer el dialogo con EE.UU. en cualquier momento si se le necesita. 
					
					Si los ejercicios belicos conjuntos que se desarrollan por EE.UU. cada ano en el suelo surcoreano y su contorno apuntan solo a la RPDC, no tendra la razon de no aceptar nuestra propuesta. 
					
					Ahora es el momento en que EE.UU. debe tomar la decision audaz para la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del Nordeste Asiatico.

articles.title: Mujeres de RPDC manifestaran su inteligencia en movimiento por reunificacion de la patria
articles.content:
Mujeres de RPDC manifestaran su inteligencia en movimiento por reunificacion de la patria
Pyongyang, 10 de enero (ACNC) -- En su declaracion fechada 9, la presidenta del Comite Central de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea subrayo que los proyectos presentados por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un en el mensaje del Ano Nuevo para mejora de las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas y la reunificacion de la patria, son los asuntos indispensables a ser solucionados sin falta en renovar realmente las relaciones intercoreanas y abrir un ancho camino por la reunificacion independiente.
					El papel de las mujeres que ocupan la mitad de la poblacion ejerce gran influencia al desarrollo de la sociedad, senalo la presidenta y continuo:
					
					Por lo tanto, el problema de reunificacion del pais depende considerablemente del rol de las mujeres.
					
					Para abrir un ancho camino por la reunificacion independiente en el presente ano del aniversario 70 de la liberacion de la patria, las mujeres norcoreanas y las integrantes de la UMDC haran levantar una gran ola de la reunificacion independiente de la epoca del 15 de Junio al fortalecer aun mas la solidaridad con las entidades de mujeres del Sur de Corea y en ultramar y realizar activamente los diversos encuentros de reunificacion.
					
					Solo cuando todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en el ultramar se levanten energicamente en la lucha por materializar cabalmente las tareas por la reunificacion de la patria, indicadas por el Mariscal en el mensaje del Ano Nuevo, se mejoraran las relaciones intercoreanas conforme a la aspiracion y la demanda de la nacion coreana y amanecera sin falta la madrugada de la reunificacion independiente.
					
					Las mujeres de la RPDC estan bien convencidas de que al igual que en el pasado, todas las mujeres del Sur de Corea y en el ultramar manifestaran la inteligencia y el temperamento de las mujeres coreanas en el movimiento patriotico por la reunificacion de la patria.

articles.title: Trabajadores agricolas manifestaran temperamento por reunificacion de la patria
articles.content:
Trabajadores agricolas manifestaran temperamento por reunificacion de la patria
Pyongyang, 10 de enero (ACNC) -- El presidente del Comite Central de la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas de Corea hizo publica el dia 9 una declaracion que senala como sigue:
					En la consigna "!Abramos un ancho camino para la reunificacion independiente con las fuerzas unidas de toda la nacion en este ano del aniversario 70 de la liberacion de la patria!", presentada por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un en el mensaje del Ano Nuevo esta reflejada su voluntad ferrea de registrar sin falta un gran cambio en la realizacion de la causa de reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Debido a la agitacion de la desconfianza y los conflictos entre ambas partes coreanas persiguiendo la "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes" y las malsanas maniobras provocativas que denigran la dignidad y el sistema de la RPDC, las relaciones N-S estan en la fase mas catastrofica.
					
					Ahora es el tiempo en que el Norte y el Sur deben romper con el pasado y escribir de nuevo la historia de las relaciones intercoreanas para el radiante futuro de la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad de la patria.
					
					Al juntar nuestra nacion la voluntad y las fuerzas, no habra nada irrealizable.
					
					Los trabajadores agricolas de la RPDC  desplegaran energicamente la lucha por materializar las tareas indicadas por el Mariscal en el mensaje de Ano Nuevo de abrir un ancho camino para la reunificacion independiente con las fuerzas unidas de toda la nacion en este ano del aniversario 70 de la liberacion de la patria.
					
					Y libraran con los campesinos surcoreanos las diversas actividades inclusive el movimiento antibelico y por la paz para eliminar el peligro de guerra y preparar el ambiente pacifico en la Peninsula Coreana y de esta manera cumpliran el papel y el deber de duenos de la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Los trabajadores agricolas de la RPDC exhortan a los campesinos surcoreanos a levantar otra vez en la tierra patria una gran ola de la epoca de 15 de Junio, para hacer activo aporte a manifestar a todo el mundo la voluntad y el temperamento de la nacion coreana.
